data.title: Revenge
data.meta_description: Your guide to Joy Division, New Order, Electronic, The Other Two, Revenge, Monaco and Factory on the Internet
data.text:
Revenge were formed in 1987 by Peter Hook, guitarist Dave Hicks and keyboardist / computer whiz Chris "CJ" Jones. Hicks previously played in a band produced by Hook, while CJ was the engineer in Hook's own Suite 16 studios in Manchester. After writing through 1988 they made their live debut at London's Skin 2 bondage in January 1990 with drummer Ashley Taylor and bass player David Potts. Their debut release was the "7 Reasons" single, followed by the "One True Passion" album.

Email me for any comments, corrections....
